trans-unit.resname: PANA·1 | Ral, Izzet Viceroy | Card Name
PANA·1 | Ral, Izzet Viceroy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: +1：检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: PANA·1 | Ral, Izzet Viceroy | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−3]: CARDNAME deals damage to target creature equal to the total number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: −3：CARDNAME对目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于放逐区中由你拥有之瞬间与法术牌数量和你坟墓场中这两类牌数量的加总。

trans-unit.resname: PANA·1 | Ral, Izzet Viceroy | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−8]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, this emblem deals 4 damage to any target and you draw two cards."
trans-unit.target: −8：你获得具有「每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，此徽记对任意一个目标造成4点伤害且你抓两张牌」的徽记。

trans-unit.resname: PANA·3 | Vraska, Golgari Queen | Card Name
PANA·3 | Vraska, Golgari Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+2]: You may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
trans-unit.target: +2：你可以牺牲另一个永久物。若你如此作，则你获得1点生命且抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: PANA·3 | Vraska, Golgari Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−3]: Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: −3：消灭目标非地永久物，且其总法术力费用须等于或小于3。

trans-unit.resname: PANA·3 | Vraska, Golgari Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−9]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game."
trans-unit.target: −9：你获得具有「每当一个由你操控的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手输掉这盘游戏」的徽记。
